animeDescription: A young girl and her flying squirrel goes to Tokyo in hopes of becoming an idol singer. On the way, she meets another girl who wants to become an actress, and together they work to achieve their dreams. (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Amino Tetsuro', ['Director']], ['Tanaka Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Kato Takao', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Yoshida Hiroshi', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard']]]
